languages.text: {n}Офицер спохватывается и снова низко кланяется.{/n} "Простите, Ваша Светлость! Делайте, что сочтете нужным!" {n}По знаку офицера другие стражи почтительно расступаются, открывая вам проход к двери.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Офицер спохватывается и снова низко кланяется.{/n} "Простите, Ваше Благородие! Делайте, что сочтете нужным!" {n}По знаку офицера другие гвардейцы почтительно расступаются, открывая вам проход к двери.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Офицер спохватывается и снова низко кланяется.{/n} "Простите, Ваша Светлость! Делайте, что сочтете нужным!" {n}По знаку офицера другие стражи почтительно расступаются, открывая вам проход к двери.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other guards take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

{n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other guards take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

{n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other guards take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

{n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

languages.text: {n}将校は冷静になり、もう一度深く頭を下げる。{/n}「お許しください、陛下！ご自由にどうぞ！」{n}将校の合図で他のワーデンたちが慇懃な足取りで下がり、扉までの道が開く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}将校は冷静になり、もう一度深く頭を下げる。{/n}「お許しください、陛下！ご自由にどうぞ！」{n}将校の合図で他のワーデンたちが慇懃な足取りで下がり、扉までの道が開く。{/n}

languages.text: {n}军官想起了自己的身份，再次深鞠一躬。{/n}“请原谅，大人！您可以全权处理这件事情！”{n}在军官的示意下，其他守卫恭敬地退后一步，为你让出了通往门口的道路。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}军官想起了自己的身份，再次深鞠一躬。{/n}“请原谅，大人！您可以全权处理这件事情！”{n}在军官的示意下，其他守卫恭敬地退后一步，为你让出了通往门口的道路。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El oficial parece recordar su posición y hace otra reverencia exagerada.{/n} «¡Perdóneme, {mf|milord|milady}! ¡Haga lo que crea conveniente!». {n}Cuando el oficial da la señal, los demás guardias dan un paso atrás con sumo respeto, despejando así el paso hasta la puerta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial parece recordar su posición y hace otra reverencia exagerada.{/n} «¡Perdóneme, {mf|milord|milady}! ¡Haga lo que crea conveniente!». {n}Cuando el oficial da la señal, los demás guardias dan un paso atrás con sumo respeto, despejando así el paso hasta la puerta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier scheint sich seiner Stellung bewusst zu werden und macht erneut eine tiefe Verbeugung.{/n} "Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Tut, was Ihr für richtig haltet!" {n}Auf ein Signal des Offiziers treten die anderen Wächter respektvoll einen Schritt zurück und machen dir den Weg zur Tür frei.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier scheint sich seiner Stellung bewusst zu werden und macht erneut eine tiefe Verbeugung.{/n} "Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Tut, was Ihr für richtig haltet!" {n}Auf ein Signal des Offiziers treten die anderen Wächter respektvoll einen Schritt zurück und machen dir den Weg zur Tür frei.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'officier semble se reprendre et s'incline à nouveau devant vous.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie ! Faites comme vous l'entendez ! » {n}Sur un signe de l'officier, les autres gardiens font un pas en arrière pour vous laisser accéder à la porte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier semble se reprendre et s'incline à nouveau devant vous.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie ! Faites comme vous l'entendez ! » {n}Sur un signe de l'officier, les autres gardiens font un pas en arrière pour vous laisser accéder à la porte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Subay, haddini aştığını fark ederek önünde bir kez daha yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "Beni affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Nasıl uygun görürseniz o şekilde ilerleyin!" {n}Subayın işaretiyle diğer dizdarlar da itaatkâr bir şekilde geri çekiliyor, kapıya doğru olan yolu açıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer seems to remember himself and offers another low bow.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Act as you see fit!" {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Subay, haddini aştığını fark ederek önünde bir kez daha yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "Beni affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Nasıl uygun görürseniz o şekilde ilerleyin!" {n}Subayın işaretiyle diğer muhafızlar itaatkâr bir şekilde geri çekiliyor, kapıya doğru olan yolu açıyorlar.{/n}
